rules.name: myRule_43
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6) AND 7
rules.label: MAJ InfoLegal

value.stringValue: OR( AND( ISNEW(), ISBLANK(TEXT([Account].Industry)), NOT(ISBLANK([Account].Industry_Code__c)) ), AND ( NOT(ISCHANGED([Account].Industry)), ISCHANGED([Account].Industry_Code__c) ) )

AND ( ISPICKVAL([Account].BillingCountryCode, "FR"), OR ( ISBLANK( [Account].IntercommunityVATnumber__c), ISCHANGED([Account].National_ID__c) ), NOT(ISBLANK([Account].National_ID__c)), ISBLANK([Account].Infolegale_conn__TECH_InfoLegaleExternalKey__c) )

AND( IF( OR ( ISPICKVAL([Account].BillingCountryCode, "FR"), ISPICKVAL([Account].BillingCountryCode, "GP"), ISPICKVAL([Account].BillingCountryCode, "YT"), ISPICKVAL([Account].BillingCountryCode, "NC"), ISPICKVAL([Account].BillingCountryCode, "RE"), ISPICKVAL([Account].BillingCountryCode, "BL"), ISPICKVAL([Account].BillingCountryCode, "MF"), ISPICKVAL([Account].BillingCountryCode, "ES"), ISPICKVAL([Account].BillingCountryCode, "GB") ) , AND( NOT(ISBLANK([Account].National_ID__c)), NOT(ISBLANK([Account].IntercommunityVATnumber__c )) ) , NOT(ISBLANK([Account].IntercommunityVATnumber__c )) ), ISPICKVAL([Account].Status__c,"To Be Validated") )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_26
formulas.expression: AND( IF( OR ( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.BillingCountryCode}, "FR"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.BillingCountryCode}, "GP"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.BillingCountryCode}, "YT"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.BillingCountryCode}, "NC"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.BillingCountryCode}, "RE"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.BillingCountryCode}, "BL"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.BillingCountryCode}, "MF"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.BillingCountryCode}, "ES"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.BillingCountryCode}, "GB") ) , AND( NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.National_ID__c})), NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.IntercommunityVATnumber__c} )) ) , NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.IntercommunityVATnumber__c} )) ), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status__c},"To Be Validated") )

value.stringValue: AND ( OR ( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE([Account].Status__c),"To Be Validated"), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE([Account].Status__c),"In Progress Validation") ) , ISPICKVAL([Account].Status__c, "Validated"), [Account].LastModifiedById != [Account].OwnerId )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_28

value.stringValue: OR( AND( ISNEW(), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT([Account].Industry))), ISBLANK([Account].Industry_Code__c) ), AND ( ISCHANGED([Account].Industry), NOT(ISCHANGED([Account].Industry_Code__c)) ) )
